name: Fetch Quest (DEMO)
description:
Controls: Z , X, Enter, Shift, Arrow Keys

What are we fetching??

Fetchy is a lost puppy! He is really good at fetching though. I bet if you do enough quests for the citizens of Turnip Town you will start to find out who Fetchy really is! 

  • An exciting, single-player adventure full of doge, doing favors, battling baddies and more.
  • Dungeons full of puzzles, enemies and old technology.
  • Try out fishing and farming to get passed the day to day grind.
  • Help the citizens of Turnip Town and watch your friendships with them grow.
  • A ton of oddball characters, all with their own stories and problems that they desire to unburden on you.
  • One day you may find a way to photograph parts of your adventure.
Is there more?

There is a lot more! But we can't show it all to you in this demo! We are working hard to develop the game right now! Consider supporting us on Patreon to help fund the development of the game and get all the updates and news first! You will also receive a monthly sticker if you join the sticker club tier.

Download Instructions

Fetch Quest is being developed for the Gameboy, so if you choose to download the ROM you will need a GB emulator or flash cart to play the game.
